name: Terry "Harmonica" Bean
description:
'''Terry Wayne "Harmonica" Bean''' (born January 26, 1961) is an American blues [[harmonica|harmonicist]], guitarist and songwriter. He has released seven albums since 2001, and appeared in three film documentaries charting present day blues experiences.

Bean has dedicated himself to promoting older blues stylings, such as [[Delta blues]] and [[Hill country blues]]. "What's stimulating to me," he said, "is people hearing the blues played like they used to hear it."
